jd: From: Aditya Raghuvanshi, Vyze araghuvanshi@vyzeinc.com Reply to: araghuvanshi@vyzeinc.com Job Description -Title: Pega DeveloperLocation: Hybrid Onsite in Austin, TX - 11501 Alterra Pkwy, STE 500Duration: 3 Months Contract (Likely to Extend)Visa: USC/GCMOI: Skype TOP 3: CSSA certification in Pega10+ years of hands-on Pega development experience with version 8.0 or higher5+ years of RESTful Integrations into PEGA platforms supporting Customer Service and or Healthcare Frameworks Job Summary: We are seeking a highly skilled Senior Pega Developer with a Certified Senior System Architect (CSSA) certification to join our dynamic team supporting our Patient /member CRM Platform. The ideal candidate will have extensive experience in Pega development, particularly with version 8.8.x, and a strong background in RESTful integrations. Experience in Customer Service and/or Healthcare frameworks is highly preferred.Key Responsibilities:Pega Development: Design, develop, and implement Pega applications using Pega 8.8.x.System Architecture: Utilize CSSA certification to ensure robust and scalable system architecture.Integration: Develop and manage RESTful integrations to ensure seamless communication between systems.Framework Expertise: Apply knowledge of Customer Service and/or Healthcare frameworks to enhance application functionality.Collaboration: Work closely with cross-functional teams, including business analysts, project managers, and other developers, to deliver high-quality solutions.Troubleshooting: Identify and resolve technical issues and bugs in a timely manner.Documentation: Maintain comprehensive documentation for all development activities and system configurations.Qualifications:Experience: Minimum of 6+ years of experience in Pega development.Certification: Certified Senior System Architect (CSSA) is required.Technical Skills: Hands-on experience with Pega 8.8.x and RESTful integrations.Framework Knowledge: Experience with Customer Service and/or Healthcare frameworks is preferred.Problem-Solving: Strong analytical and problem-solving skills.Communication: Excellent verbal and written communication skills.Team Player: Ability to work effectively in a team environment.Required Skills:PegaSQLRest ServicesCase ManagementProcess Management Minimum Degree Required: Bachelor's Degree
